Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: The room was beautiful country french chic The staff were excellent very helpful Loved the room the staff and the location I will definitely return

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: The in room breakfast of fresh squeezed orange juice rich coffee fluffy croissants jam yoghurt cheese and butter was a delectable luxury The staff was super accommodating and location perfect The real boon is having a nightly table at their unique restaurant

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The lighting in the bathroom was difficult to see your makeup
Positive_Review: Very cozy very French in bustling Saint Germain We are already missing our daily breakfast of eggs cheese croissants and fresh squeezed orange juice

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: We enjoyed an exceptional experience We highly recommend this lovely Paris hotel
Positive_Review: The staff was exceptional with service and willingness to provide a very enjoyable experience in this lovely boutique style hotel Fresh flowers were everywhere and rooms were cleaned well throughout our stay Myself my niece and a dear friend thoroughly enjoyed the quality and care provided by this unique hotel located within easy walking distance to the extraordinary museums of Paris many enjoyable nearby restaurants and cafes and the Metro station

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: The property is centrally located to many restaurants and attractions Hotel staffs do speak English and are very friendly and helpful We had visited Paris many times in the past and this hotel is the best one The Le Comptoir du Relais restaurant serves delicious food and it is part of the hotel The hotel receptionist can reserve it for you when you stay at this hotel Otherwise there is a long wait line even at 10 pm

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: The only complaint I have is the restaurant Even though we communicate well in French when it comes to dining our reading of French isn t the best If they could at least have one or two English menu s so we can better understand what we re ordering Our waiter was the only one during our visit in France whom we encountered who gave a poor and arrogant description of the menu Given the price of the menu items we wanted to know for sure we ordering accordingly In this case I consider his young age The others in the restaurant were very friendly
Positive_Review: The neighborhood it s located in The staff was very kind and spoke good English Each room was unique and comfortable While we were there the weather was very warm and our air conditioner initially did not work The staff immediately responded and fixed it We really enjoyed our time there and so did our daughters who had a separate room It s worth taking advantage of getting a reservation at the properties restaurant Only guests at the hotel get to do this

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: The location was perfect I was a woman traveling alone and felt very safe in the neighborhood Metro stop close by and convenient Lots of great places to eat in the area but the restaurant at the hotel was excellent As a guest at the hotel I was able to make a reservation otherwise there was a long line of diners waiting to get a table The staff was very helpful I would definitely stay there again and recommend it to friends

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Access to our room was up narrow winding stairs and the elevator only let you off between floors From 8am to 6pm the hotel was remodeling the room next door They were constantly hammering and drilling in our common wall it was terrible But before and after it was a very quiet and pleasant room
Positive_Review: Staff was extremely helpful and very nice Room was very comfortable Location was super And the food at the hotel s restaurant was OUT OF THIS WORLD GREAT

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Very small bathroom and room even if it was junior suite Accomodation not in line with 4 star hotel Elevator to small difficult to use with luggage
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: The hotel is extremely well located just off Boulevard Saint Germain des Pres The rooms are charming comfortable and contain all the amenities one could ask for The hotel staff is pleasant and very helpful I will return to this hotel on my next trip to Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Nothing with hotel Maybe next time we get better weather lol Still love you Paris
Positive_Review: We arrived very early before our room was ready and they were very helpful and accommodating for two tired and hungry travelers Staff and owner very friendly and helpful Location is perfect and very close to the metro I love breakfast and theirs was wonderful Will be coming back and staying here This April week the weather was freezing rainy windy and even got snow flurries but room was warm and cozy

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: My elderly parents stayed there once before and loved it Sadly the amazing restaurant was closed this time It is a smart boutique hotel with modern amenities but in the old style in the best area of Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: There was no view a big window box of beautiful flowers was there The bathroom was small
Positive_Review: location was great staff was very helpful breakfast was very good the junior suite was spacious and comfortable

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: I liked everything from this hotel Excellent localisation excellent food and service and the rooms were elegant and comfortable with a decent size As North American we were not disappointed in terms of space

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: Location location location Loved the St Germaine neighborhood with so many cafes and shops just one or two blocks away from the hotel and the Pont Neuf also a few minutes walk the other direction Yet the hotel was hidden down a short very quiet side street Charming property

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: Amazing breakfast every morning fabulous location close to everything for walking or getting a train taxi or bus Staff was incredibly helpful and friendly

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Wifi was frustrating and matress was hard and lumpy pillows not great either Maybe because i had twin beds pushed together Unacceptable hairdryer No powerpoints near mirrors
Positive_Review: Location and ambience of room and hotel lobby Nice staff most of the time

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Negative_Review: Wifi had a slow download speed and was patchy Lift to room only holds two people and the steps if used are narrow and winding not suitable for older people
Positive_Review: Location room and facilities breakfast and meal in the associated Relais Le Comptoir restaurant

Hotel_Name: H tel Le Relais Saint Germain
Positive_Review: Excellent rooms Great interiors and the perfect location

Negative_Review: Hairdryer in room 30 Water heater exploded in room 30 and the air did not work well Loved room 42
